name: Cat Burglar
text: As a master athlete, you become a rogue of a higher caliber who can surprise adversaries with unbelievable moves and amazing feats of physical stamina while remaining true to your roots as a thief or a scoundrel.

features.acrobaticAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you also gain an extra move action that you must use this turn
features.bodyControl(11thLevel): Whenever you are affected by a pull, a push, or a slide, you can move 1 less square than the effect specifies
features.athleticMaster(16thLevel): Roll twice whenever you make an Athletics check
